data.title: Sumeet Raghavan, Bhargavi Chirmule and Sharad Ponkshe talk about ‘Sandook’
data.meta_description: out the interview of Team Sandook - Sumeet Raghavan, Bhargavi Chirmule and Sharad Ponkshe. ‘Sandook’, the upcoming Marathi film directed by Atul Kale, will release on 5th June 2015.
data.text:
Natasa Preaches Patience In The Face of Hate; Internet Goes All Praise

Actress and model Natasa Stankovic has taken a moment to reflect and share her wisdom with fans. In a recent video, she emphasised the importance of slowing down and trusting in divine timing. The post comes amid recent online criticism, with many praising her graceful handling of the situation.

1045 views | 2 days ago

Richa Chadha Urges CM Mamata Banerjee for Impartial Investigation in Kolkata Case

Richa Chadha has expressed her deep concern over the horrific Kolkata rape and murder case by turning to social media, urging Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee to ensure swift and impartial justice. She emphasized the expectation of a fair investigation from Banerjee, who is currently the only female Chief Minister in India. The incident has sparked widespread outrage among activists, celebrities, and politicians, highlighting the pressing issue of women’s safety. Social media platforms are buzzing with reactions to the disturbing case. Previously, both Kangana Ranaut and Swara Bhasker had condemned the crime.

988 views | 3 days ago

Abhishek Bachchan Responds to Divorce Speculation Amid Viral Fake Video: Reports

Abhishek Bachchan has finally addressed the rumors about a split with his wife, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan. During a recent interview, he displayed his wedding ring and expressed his frustration over the speculation, while acknowledging that such rumours are part of celebrity life. Abhishek stated, 'I am still married. I don't have anything to say to you all about that. You all have blown the entire thing out of proportion, sadly. I understand why you do it; you have to file some stories. It's okay, we're celebrities, we have to take it.' The rumours started when Abhishek and Aishwarya attended separate events at the Ambani wedding, and were further fueled by Abhishek’s like on a post about divorce cases.

3342 views | 6 days ago
